channel.title: Groups on Moonfall Sessions
channel.description: Recent content in Groups on Moonfall Sessions

item.title: Lakeshore Vale Villagers
item.description: A collection of interdimensional refugees trapped in a village at the base of an astral tree, recently freed from nightly monster attacks

item.title: Organizations, Factions & Collective Forces
item.description: Twenty significant groups, organizations, and collective entities that have shaped the political, social, and supernatural landscape of the campaign

item.title: Skyhammer Clan
item.description: Red’s ancestral Goliath clan living in an advanced mountain settlement, building starships to combat the Eldoran Empire’s cosmic dominance

item.title: Twilight Company
item.description: An underground resistance organization opposing the Eldoran Empire through intelligence gathering, sabotage, and protecting those fleeing Imperial persecution

item.title: The Eldoran Empire
item.description: A totalitarian theocracy led by the ascended goddess Empress Eldora, expanding across realms through military conquest, religious persecution, and cosmic-scale warfare
